index.speaker: kevin-remde
index.name: Microsoft and Containers Containers Containers!
index.description: The popularity of using containers and tools like Docker for managing and deploying workloads in an agile, massively scalable way has not been missed by Microsoft. In this session you'll be introduced to the many ways Microsoft and Azure are supporting containers, as well as new Windows containers built-in to Windows Server 2016.
index.title: Microsoft and Containers Containers Containers! | Sessions | MKE DOT NET
index.metaDescription: Description for Microsoft and Containers Containers Containers!
